Home → Events and activities → Get online

Get online

All Suffolk Libraries offer free internet access and informal advice on getting online.

If you have a library card number and a PIN you can book a computer online.

Some libraries offer free one to one computer and internet training:

Library Activity Day Times
Aldeburgh Library Internet training sessions for beginners: book in advance Sunday 1300-1400
Aldeburgh Library Internet training sessions for beginners: book in advance Sunday 1400-1500
Beccles Library Absolute Beginners in computers: book in advance (4 week course) Wednesday 0900-1030
Beccles Library Internet and email sessions for beginners: book in advance (4 week course) Thursday 0900-1030
Beccles Library Tablet and eReader training sessions for beginners: book in advance Tuesday every 2 weeks 0900-1000
Broomhill Library Internet training sessions for beginners: book in advance Tuesday 1030-1130
Broomhill Library Internet training sessions for beginners: drop-in Tuesday 1145-1245
Broomhill Library Internet training sessions for beginners: drop-in Friday every 2 weeks 1000-1100
Broomhill Library Internet training sessions for beginners: drop-in Friday every 2 weeks 1100-1200
Bungay Library Internet, tablet and Ancestry training sessions for beginners: book in advance first Wednesday of the month 1000-1300
Bungay Library Internet, tablet and Ancestry training sessions for beginners: book in advance Thursday 1000-1200
Bungay Library Internet, tablet and Ancestry training sessions for beginners: book in advance Friday 1000-1200
Capel St Mary Library Computer and tablet training sessions for beginners drop-in: bring in your own device Tuesday 1000-1200
Gainsborough Community Library Absolute Beginners: book in advance Sessions arranged on a mutually convenient basis N/a
Gainsborough Community Library Internet training sessions for beginners: drop-in Monday every 2 weeks 1030-1200
Great Cornard Library Internet training sessions for beginners: book in advance Thursday 1700-1800
Great Cornard Library Internet training sessions for beginners: book in advance Saturday 1300-1400
Halesworth Library iPad training sessions for beginners: book in advance (£5 per session) Wednesday 1515-1615
Halesworth Library Laptop training sessions for beginners: book in advance (£5 per session) Wednesday 1400-1500
Haverhill Library 1:1 IT tutorials on PC or tablets: £5 for half an hour, £7.50 for up to an hour Sessions arranged on a mutually convenient basis N/a
Haverhill Library Storytime: stories for pre-school children Monday 1000-1030
Ipswich County Library Internet training sessions for beginners: book in advance Friday 1500-1530
Ipswich County Library Internet training sessions for beginners: book in advance Friday 1530-1600
Ipswich County Library Internet training sessions for beginners: book in advance Sunday 1400-1430
Ipswich County Library Internet training sessions for beginners: book in advance Sunday 1430-1500
Lowestoft Library Absolute Beginners 1:1: Internet and computer training sessions for beginners – book in advance Sessions arranged on a mutually convenient basis N/a
Needham Market Library Internet training sessions for beginners: book in advance Sunday 1300-1400
Oulton Broad Library Internet training session for beginners: book in advance Sunday 1100-1600
Rosehill Library Internet training sessions for beginners: book in advance Sunday 1300-1400
Southwold Library Internet training sessions for beginners: book in advance Sunday 1300-1530
Stowmarket Library Internet training sessions for beginners: book in advance Sessions arranged on a mutually convenient basis All day
Sudbury Library 1-to-1 computer taster sessions: book in advance Wednesday 1045-1145
Sudbury Library 1-to-1 computer taster sessions: book in advance Thursday 1045-1145
Wickham Market Library Free IT support, guidance on the internet and troubleshooting hardware and software issues: book in advance Friday 1000-1400
Woodbridge Library Free 1-to-1 computer, laptop, tablet and smartphone help: book in advance Monday 1000-1200
Woodbridge Library Free 1-to-1 computer, laptop, tablet and smartphone help: book in advance Thursday 1000-1200
